about_the_game:
well this is my first professional game. fortunately or unfortunately made completely alone by just one person a classic indie game. which shows some of the greatest geniuses of humanity like Sir Isaac Newton, Sir Edmond Halley, Christiaan Huygens and Albert Einstein and also the impact that an antichrist can have, shaking all existing structures until then for example Genghis Khan, Nabucodonosor 2, Napoleão Bonaparte and Adolf Hitler a historical game literally. well " together with a special super warrior will bring an incredible and unparalleled adventure. This game portrays the death of Giordano Bruno until his incredible resurrection and on him thoughts God is infinite, so His universe must be too. Thus is the excellence of God magnified and the greatness of His kingdom made manifest; He is glorified not in one, but in countless suns; not in a single earth, a single world, but in a thousand thousand, I say in an infinity of worlds." MEMORIES " THIS IS THE PLACE WHERE THE GREATEST GENIUS OF THE HUMAN HISTORY FINDS HIS WARRIOR SIDE THAT'S WARRIOR VEIN DEEP INSIDE. "

MANY FEATURES GENIUS VS ANTICHRIST1 DOCUMENTALMAINMENU :

5 AMAZING CHARACTERS TO CHOOSE THEM AS GENIUSES SIR ALBERT EINSTEIN, SIR EDMOND HALLEY, SIR ISAAC NEWTON , CHRISTIAAN HUYGENS AND ONE SPECIAL WARRIOR .

20 DIFFERENT TYPE OF ENEMIES WITH DIFFERENT STYLES AND DIFFERENT LEVELS OF POWER " HARDER " .


4 BIG BOSSESS ASAN ANTICHRIST GENGHISKHAN, NAPOLEON BONAPARTE, NABUCODONOSOR2 AND ADOLF HITLER .


TOGGLE CAMERAS VIEWS FIRSTPERSONSHOOTER, THIRDPERSONCLOSER, SIDESCROLLER VIEW, TOPDOWN VIEW AND INVENTORYCAMERA PRESS F TO CHANGE THE VIEWS .

1 BEASTMASTER " GIANTMONSTER TO PLAY WITH HIM PRESS E TO INTERACT WITH HIMSELF .


THIS PROJECT CALLED GENIUS VS ANTICHRIST1 WAS MADE IN UNREALENGINE4 .
USING C++ CODETIME .


11 DIFFERENT AMAZING DARKER LEVELS .COSMOS POSSIBLE OPEN WORLDS .
